title: Facebook : most popular game MAU 2019
summary: The statistic presents the best Facebook games 2019 ad of 2019 , ranked by production and marketing Monthly .
It is estimated that the MAU most Facebook games so far is Texas_Holdem_Poker , released in fall .
Bungie and Activision are believed to have invested 10 millions users in the development and marketing of this games .
gold: This statistic lists the most popular Facebook games , based on monthly active users . As of August 2019 , Candy Crush Saga had approximately ten million monthly active users on Facebook . Fifth-ranked Subway Surfers had five million MAU in the same period .
